# Problem 1

Import a dataset

```{r}
litters_df = read_csv("data/pols-month.csv") |> 
   separate(mon, into = c("year", "month", "day"), sep = "-") |>
   mutate(
    year = as.integer(year),
    month = as.integer(month),
    day = as.integer(day),
   
    month = month.name[month],
  
    president = case_when(
      prez_gop == 1 ~ "gop",
      prez_dem == 1 ~ "dem"
    )
  ) |>
  select(-day, -prez_gop, -prez_dem)
litters_df
```
